rows.label: qev035702_MSG0001
rows.name: I thought you would flee, little insect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0002
rows.name: But now it's time to atone for murdering my sister.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0003
rows.name: I've placed a time bomb on your idiot friend, Slovity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0004
rows.name:
Her death will come in five short minutes.
Oh, but do not pity her![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0005
rows.name:
...For she will not go aloneâ€”I will see to your
execution as well! Aaaah ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0006
rows.name:
Now, share in your final experience together!
Suffer and die in penance for your crime![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0007
rows.name: Bomb is removed? I am saved?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0008
rows.name:
Damn her! It must be holdover from cursed gear!
As soon as I saw her, my body turned traitor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0009
rows.name:
You had to save me again.
I am filled with shame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev035702_SEL0011
rows.name: Chide Slovity for her carelessness.

rows.label: qev035702_JNK0020
rows.name: Console

rows.label: qev035702_SEL0021
rows.name:
Assure Slovity that there was
nothing she could have done.

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0010
rows.name:
I failed to defend myself. Caused you hardship.
I will cease rampages for while as punishment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0011
rows.name: But once I am stronger, rampages will begin anew![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0012
rows.name: Ugh. Your words shame me even more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0013
rows.name: There is no choice. I must grow stronger. Like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0014
rows.name:
I will return to New LA and start training regimen
from hell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0015
rows.name: In meantime, take this as thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035702_MSG0016
rows.name:
I hope to challenge you again someday.
I will not lose next time. This is promise![ST:wait ]
